articles.title: French police clash with black-clad anarchists during May Day rallies - Reuters
articles.description: French police clashed with hundreds of black-clad anarchists in Paris and other cities during union-led protests against President Emmanuel Macron's increase in the retirement age, as workers staged Labour Day rallies across Europe.
articles.content: PARIS, May 1 (Reuters) - French police clashed with hundreds of black-clad anarchists in Paris and other cities during union-led protests against President Emmanuel Macron's increase in the retiremen… [+3956 chars]
